alert.note: Alert for Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 13 at 6:38PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Victoria County through 715 PM CDT... At 637 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Telferner, or 8 miles northeast of Victoria, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Victoria, Guadalupe, Victoria Colony Creek Country Club, Dacosta, Brentwood Subdivision, Wood Hi, Inez, Salem, Victoria Regional Airport and Telferner. This includes the following highways... US Highway 59 between mile markers 622 and 634. US Highway 77 between mile markers 566 and 570. US Highway 87 between mile markers 818 and 820. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
